title: Great area to stay in for a visit to NYC!
text:
We very much enjoyed 4 nites at this hotel in January during the boat show. I was upgraded to a room with a view of the Statue of Liberty which was very nice. Breakfast in the hotel was just OK....not too crazy about that restaurant in the hotel for breakfast, but the concierge lounge is very nice.
We walked over to the World Trade Center museum (5 minutes away) and enjoyed an escorted tour there. Just next door to WTC museum is the new Eataly where we had lunch and did some shopping. Another short walk brought us to the Native American museum and also to Fraunces Tavern where we enjoyed the small museum there. Finally. another short walk brought us to Delmonico's restaurant for a great dinner.
We had a great stay and enjoyed being in this part of the city.
